NK008(nya)002:0: 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i dbang gi brgyud 'debs bzhugs /
NK008(nya)002:1: khyab bdag ston pa 'jam dpal ma ru rtse //
NK008(nya)002:2: gsang bdag zla 'od many+dzu mi tra dang /
NK008(nya)002:3: sangs rgyas ye shes yon tan rgya mtsho ste //
NK008(nya)002:4: bka' bab dang po'i brgyud par gsol ba 'debs //
NK008(nya)002:5: 'jam dpal bshes gnyen o rgyan pad+ma 'byung //
NK008(nya)002:6: d+ha na da la yon tan rgya matsho'am //
NK008(nya)002:7: pad 'byung bal mo gser phreng gnubs yab sras //
NK008(nya)002:8: bka' babs bar pa'i brgyud par 'jam dpal bshes gnyen d+ha na ta la nas //
NK008(nya)002:9: khu lung par brgyud bka' babs gsum pa ste /
NK008(nya)002:10: brgyud tshul kun 'dus yon tan rgya mtsho dang //
NK008(nya)002:11: pad+ma dbang rgyal rnam rgyal 'jam dpal so rgad bza' dang ye shes gzungs //
NK008(nya)002:12: dar rje dbang gzhon chos seng bkra shis dar //
NK008(nya)002:13: dar seng seng dar ye shes rgya mtsho dang //
NK008(nya)002:14: 'jam dpal seng ge rnams la kun dga' bkra shis rgyal sras chos rje dang //
NK008(nya)002:15: rdo rje dpal bzang bsod nams dbang rgyal mtshan //
NK008(nya)002:16: rdo rje rgyal po mthu chen nyi ma dang //
NK008(nya)002:17: karma phrin rnams la kun dga' bstan 'dzin rdo rje tshe rab dang //
NK008(nya)002:18: rnam rgyal bzang po o rgyan gter bdag gling //
NK008(nya)002:19: rin chen rnam rgyal pad+ma bstan 'dzin zhabs //
NK008(nya)002:20: o rgyan bstan 'dzin rnams la karma bi dza pad+ma dbang rgyal dang //
NK008(nya)002:21: dpal gyi rdo rje pad+ma mang+ga la //
NK008(nya)002:22: gzhan phan mtha' yas pad+ma badz+ra rtsal //
NK008(nya)002:23: bstan pa'i nyi ma rnams la 'jigs med kun dka' bstan 'dzin nor bu'i sde //
NK008(nya)002:24: khyab bdag 'gyur med phan bde'i 'od zer zhabs //
NK008(nya)002:25: brgyud srol kun 'dus rtsa ba'i bla ma dang //
NK008(nya)002:26: yi dam lha tshogs rnams la rje btsun thugs rje'i bdag nyid khyed rnams kyis //
NK008(nya)002:27: bdag sogs 'gro la smin grol lam ston cing //
NK008(nya)002:28: brgal dka' srid pa'i rgya mtsho chen po las //
NK008(nya)002:29: de ring nyid nas 'dren par mdzad du gsol //
NK008(nya)002:30: rnam dag dbang bzhi'i chu bos bdag rgyud kyi //
NK008(nya)002:31: dkyil 'khor rnam bzhi'i sa bon legs smin nas //
NK008(nya)002:32: grol byed gdams pas sku bzhi mngon byed pa'i //
NK008(nya)002:33: rten 'brel myur du 'grigs par byin gyis rlobs //
NK008(nya)002:34: ma dag snang zhen bskyed pa'i rim pas sbyangs //
NK008(nya)002:35: dag pa'i sems nyid rdzogs rim bde chen gyis //
NK008(nya)002:36: smin nas 'od gsal rdzogs pa chen po'i don //
NK008(nya)002:37: tshe 'di nyid la mngon du 'gyur bar shog /
NK008(nya)002:38: ces rgyal sras gzhan phan mtha' yas kyi gsung la
NK008(nya)002:39: brgyud pa'i khyad par gyis gter chen nas bdag gi
NK008(nya)002:40: rigs bdag bla ma'i bar kha bsgyur ba po ni
